Musical Robotics: Research Assistant

Sophomore Year College

The Musical Robotics Lab holds a variety of robotics instruments unique to the kind of research only available at Worcester Polytechnic Insitute. Instruments like the PVC Aerophone, Whamola, Cynther, and the Robotic Drums were created at Alden Hall in Musical Robotics Lab.

During Sophomore Year, I worked on a variety of these instruments focusing on researching on the MBED framework in the nucleo board for the instrument manipulation from the laptop over GUI buttons sending signals in embedded C to control these robotic instruments. Using various libraries and learning about the necessary information of the nucleo board through datasheets, search engines, and books.
